message:
Interesting new unofficial train info app.
Hard to compare with the official Metro app screenshot.

Interestingly, a lot of people who could afford an iPhone are like shocked that the iPhone version is paid! Will be interesting to see how well the app goes financially for other entrepreneurs to learn from its story

data.message: The paid part I find weird not because they shouldn't sell it for money but because it's paid on iOS but free on Android. Why? Genuine question. It's a $0.99, it's not like you have to have an iPhone/be able to afford an iPhone to afford it.

will be great if they add users' feedback + GPS location about the expected arrival time for each train in each station (I mean when the train is late then the official time - and it's a lot-, so anyone waiting for the train can know the expected real arrival time)
Sally Ahmed Mohamed, Mostafa Hawary تنفع البشريه 😂
it will be great if the app notify people what  is going on ?if something happen or accident affected on train moving  and show alert .....
Software will eventually all be free with monetary value = 0.

شغال علي برنامج شبيه بقالي اسبوعين.. :'( :'( :'( 
انا برنامجي احلي بس الواد ده عنده dB ادق بكتير من الي عندي...
Does anyone know where it pulls its data from? Is it just scraping the government website?
